thread.section_title: Rush Order Tees Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rush Order Tees | rushordertees.com
thread.title: Mike B Anderson
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Mike B Anderson

author: Mike B Anderson
title: Mike B Anderson
text: I'm as happy as a customer can be with the excellent work and fantastic customer service at Rush Order Tees. I've done two T-shirt orders with them that required special handling and in both cases was dazzled by the quality and speed of the service. I'm particularly impressed because the art I provided on one was problematic. Instead of just printing the shirts and letting it go, I was contacted by an artist who sorted out the problem on the phone and the final shirts were awesome! Love these folks and will use them every time!
